resume.name: Pacy
resume.summary: Born in Kitakyushu, lived in Kansai and Thailand before moving to Tokyo. A fan of anime and Vtubers, and passionate about creating the future of subculture. Currently working on front-end development with Nuxt.js/Next.js, server-side development with TypeScript/Go/Python, and smart contract development with Solidity.

work.title: Faculty of Economics
work.description: Specialized in economic growth theory in macroeconomics. Engaged in empirical analysis and statistical approaches using Python's scikit-learn alongside theoretical analysis.

work.title: Full Stack Engineer
work.description: Interned as a full-stack engineer mainly using Ruby. Worked as the person in charge of front-end, back-end, and infrastructure for web applications.

work.title: Front-end Engineer → Back-end/Infrastructure Engineer
work.description: Maintained and developed new features for an HRTech business front-end with ARR in the millions of dollors using Elm. After transferring to the advertising business, took charge of the log aggregation infrastructure for a Docomo distribution system with an annual transaction volume of tens of millions of dollors, maintaining and developing new features in Scala for server-side/infrastructure.

work.title: Full Stack Engineer → NFT Business Development Lead → CTO
work.description: Developed NFTStudio and broadcasted by TV. Developed GameFi using Astar's first Dapp Staking, AstarFarm contract. Participated in the development of the Oasys chain from the early stages and launched OasysHub. Later, as CTO, handled crisis management, long-term strategy planning, company-wide quality improvement, and technology selection.

projects.title: AstarFarm
projects.description: The first Dapp Staking contract on the Astar chain, a Wrapper Dapp for a GameFi project with a TVL of 5 million dollor. Featured on Debunk.

projects.title: OasysHub
projects.description: Participated in the development of the game-specific domestic blockchain Oasys from the early stages, leading the development of the staking site front-end.

projects.title: MashiroAI NFT
projects.description: In October 2022, at the start of the generative AI boom, developed a 1024-piece NFT project in two weeks using NovelAI. Collaborated with Neo Tokyo Punks for the NFT, Neo Tokyo Punks Memory, selling out all 2222 pieces.

projects.title: Oas Jumbo!
projects.description: Contract development for Buncha Inc. Wrapped the Oasys chain's Precompiled Staking contract in a DApp that awards lottery NFTs through staking. Reached a TVL of 2 million dollor within 10 days of launch.

projects.title: PSYCHO-PASS.ai
projects.description: An NFT x AI game project based on the anime PSYCHO-PASS. Purchasing a Dominator NFT allows you to play a hue diagnosis game, with the results reflected in your NFT. Playing the game earns hue points, which can be used to spin the NFT gacha.
